summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent coordinating with the Boston InfraGard chapter regarding a proposed webinar presentation about the efforts to locate and capture Ghislaine Maxwell. The presentation would focus only on the capture, not the investigation or trial material.

persons.name: Steve
persons.role: FBI Special Agent, InfraGard / Private Sector Coordinator
persons.context: The sender of the email, coordinating between the New York and Boston InfraGard chapters regarding a proposed presentation on Ghislaine Maxwell's capture.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The proposed InfraGard webinar is about the efforts to locate and capture her.

connections.description: Steve, as an FBI agent, is involved in coordinating a presentation about the efforts to locate and capture Maxwell.

events.title: Email coordination for Maxwell presentation
events.description: An FBI agent emails to coordinate and deconflict a proposed Boston InfraGard webinar about the efforts to locate and capture Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The FBI's InfraGard program was considering a webinar presentation about the efforts to locate and capture Ghislaine Maxwell.
The proposed presentation was to be hosted by the Boston InfraGard chapter and would focus solely on the capture, not the underlying investigation or trial material.
Coordination was occurring between the New York and Boston FBI offices to 'deconflict' the presentation.
The email demonstrates ongoing law enforcement and private sector (InfraGard) interest in the Maxwell case as of January 2022.
